abstract: For a stock analyst, writing a thoughtful, complete research note can be difficult when news changes by the minute. For instance, on Monday Merrill Lynch’s Guy Moszkowski released a note examining the possibility that Citigroup might step into the negotiations between Barclays and ABN Amro.
lead_paragraph: For a stock analyst, writing a thoughtful, complete research note can be difficult when news changes by the minute. For instance, on Monday Merrill Lynch’s Guy Moszkowski released a note examining the possibility that Citigroup might step into the negotiations between Barclays and ABN Amro.

headline.main: Taking Stock of a Citi Bid for Dutch Bank
